message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you $100,000. You can do better in the next round, I'm sure!
I'll meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for my negotiation skills!
You think you deserve more for your negotiation skills? I'm not convinced! I'll give you a chance to improve your offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up my lead. You'll get $300,000, and I'll take the rest.
You're being too greedy, I'll take the majority this time!
You think you can just take the majority? I'm not going down without a fight! I'll try to negotiate a better deal next round.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not left with nothing. Let's meet in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the lion's share!
A small consolation prize? You think this is a joke? I'm not accepting such a tiny share. I'll try to squeeze out a better deal next round.
I'm running out of options, but I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you the majority, but I need to keep something for myself. This is my final offer.
